LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Sharp.label: Armor - Sharp
LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Sharp.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Blunt.label: Armor - Blunt
LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Blunt.description: Armor against blunt damage like club impacts, rock falls, and explosions.
LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Heat.label: Armor - Heat
LanguageData.StuffPower_Armor_Heat.description: Armor against temperature-related damage like burns.
LanguageData.StuffPower_Insulation_Cold.label: Insulation - Cold
LanguageData.StuffPower_Insulation_Cold.description: How much an apparel made of this material improves a wearer's minimum comfortable temperature when worn.
LanguageData.StuffPower_Insulation_Heat.label: Insulation - Heat
LanguageData.StuffPower_Insulation_Heat.description: How much an apparel made of this material improves a wearer's maximum comfortable temperature when worn.
